name: Application
description: Represents the Excel application that manages the workbook.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: calculationMode
properties.description: Returns the calculation mode used in the workbook.

methods.name: calculate
methods.description: Recalculate all currently opened workbooks in Excel.

parameters.name: calculationType
parameters.description: Specifies the calculation type to use.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
